Schedule (all times are real world unless otherwise noted)
- Server restarts: [00ff00]3 AM[-], [00ff00]noon[-], and [00ff00]7 PM[-] Eastern; [ff0000]WARNING: resets regions, vehicles, drones, and turrets[-]
- Blood rains: [ff0000]4 AM[-], [ff0000]1 PM[-], and [ff0000]8 PM[-] Eastern; Blood rains start on [00ff00]game day 7[-] and last [ff0000]20 minutes[-]
- [ff0000]Blood rains[-] are our version of horde nights, but scheduled on real world time, not game time.
- [00ff00]PvP is off[-], however indirect damage, e.g. exploding vehicles, still works. [ff0000]Killing players is a bannable offense.[-]
- Land claims and bedrolls [00ff00]cannot be placed in quest POIs[-] (those with red skulls).
- Land claim protection is [00ff00]disabled on public roads[-]; don't place one so that it overlaps a road.
- Land claims are [00ff00]immune from player damage[-], however testing this is considered griefing and may get you [ff0000]banned[-].
- You will be [ff0000]removed from a land claim[-] if you are not partied with the owner or ally.
- Zombies can only enter your land claim if [00ff00]you or one of your allies are within 200 m[-].
- Boxes labeled [00ff00]sort[-] will auto-sort their contents to other boxes in your claim.
